content: the catalina cardigan crochet pattern is a beginner level cardigan pattern it s made as almost one piece and has very little sewing i will have a video tutorial to help every step of the way materials-- worsted weight acrylic yarn s 500g m 600g l 700g xl 800g 2x 900g 3x 1000g i used lion brand heartland in canyon any worsted weight acrylic cotton or wool would work great for this pattern i/5 5 mm hook or whatever hook needed to obtain gauge stitch markers yarn needle scissors measuring tape approx finished size-- bust s 35 m 39 l 43 xl 47 2x 51 3x 55 length s 23 25 m 24 75 l 26 25 xl 27 75 2x 29 25 3x 30 75 armhole width s 7 m 7 5 l 8 xl 8 5 2x 9 3x 9 5 sleeve length s 23 m 24 l 25 xl 26 2x 27 3x 28 size small pictured i am 5 0 with 34 bust
